mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, (AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(B.PASSWORD), (SELECT OBJECT FROM abworld.COMMON WHERE TITLE = 'USER' AND SUBTITLE = 'LOGIN' AND ID = 'CIPHERS'))) AS PWD FROM (SELECT ID FROM abworld.USER WHERE ID = #{id}) A INNER JOIN abworld.USER_DETAIL B ON A.ID = B.ID WHERE B.PASSWORD = HEX(aes_encrypt(#{pwd}, (SELECT OBJECT FROM abworld.COMMON WHERE TITLE = 'USER' AND SUBTITLE = 'LOGIN' AND ID = 'CIPHERS')))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (ID, NAME, PRIORITY, PHONE, ADDDATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{role}, #{phone}, DEFAULT);
